Sera_Volkov.initial: Guide/student - she's further along the Change, shows him what he's becoming
Sera_Volkov.power_dynamic: Sera has knowledge and acceptance; Adrian has fear and resistance
Sera_Volkov.tension: She wants him to embrace transformation; he wants to stay human
Sera_Volkov.evolution: By Book 3, they think in synchrony - barely need words

Dr_Marie_Okonkwo.initial: Doctor/patient - she studies him, he cooperates hoping for cure
Dr_Marie_Okonkwo.power_dynamic: She has institutional power; he has information she needs
Dr_Marie_Okonkwo.tension: She treats him as specimen; he needs to be seen as person
Dr_Marie_Okonkwo.evolution: Grows into mutual respect, then tragedy as he transcends her help

Colonel_Reeves.power_dynamic: Reeves has physical control; Adrian has nothing to lose
Colonel_Reeves.tension: Reeves sees him as threat; Adrian sees him as murderer in waiting
Colonel_Reeves.evolution: Escalates to existential confrontation - human vs posthuman

Lena_Martinez.power_dynamic: Emotionally equal but increasingly different realities
Lena_Martinez.tension: She represents humanity and normalcy he's losing; he represents her trauma
Lena_Martinez.evolution: Heartbreaking divergence - love insufficient to bridge transformation

Dr_Marie_Okonkwo.initial: Test subject/researcher but Sera has all the power through acceptance
Dr_Marie_Okonkwo.power_dynamic: Marie has physical control; Sera has psychological dominance
Dr_Marie_Okonkwo.tension: Marie wants to cure; Sera pities her blindness

Colonel_Reeves.initial: Reeves wants her dead; Sera is beyond caring
Colonel_Reeves.power_dynamic: Reeves has weapons; Sera has transcended fear of death
Colonel_Reeves.tension: She's the future; he's fighting the inevitable

Colonel_Reeves.power_dynamic: Reeves has military authority; Marie has scientific expertise
Colonel_Reeves.tension: She needs time to research; he wants immediate elimination

Lena_Martinez.initial: Allies in trying to save Adrian
Lena_Martinez.power_dynamic: Marie has expertise; Lena has emotional connection
